name: Standup Raven
description: A Mattermost plugin for communicating daily standups across teams

settings.help_text: The time zone your team is working in. This is to make sure all datetimes you enter are interpreted in your timezone and not in server's. This can be overridden in channel standup configuration.
Requires Mattermost Enterprise Edition. If enabled, only channel admins, team admins or system admins are allowed to configure standup for a channel or update it.
Help improve Standup Raven by sending error reports and diagnostic information. No messages or personal data is stored.
